head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SANFILIPPO, KATE (NEE CALOGERO)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SANFILIPPO, KATE (NEE CALOGERO)

block.p: SANFILIPPO-Kate (nee Calogero). On Octber 21, 2000, age 95. Devoted wife of the late Joseph SanFilippo. Beloved mother of J. Anthony SanFilippo, M.D. Cherished grandmother of Joseph and Mary Kate SanFilippo and John and Maryann SanFilippo. Great-grandmother of Joseph Anthony SanFilippo and Emma Rose SanFilippo. Dear mother-in-law of Catherine SanFilippo. Loving sister of the late Thomas Calogero, Frances Micalizio, Josephine Giamboi, Anthony Calogero, Noel Calogero and William Calogero. Reposing at the Graham Funeral Home, 1036 Boston Post Road, Rye, NY, Monday, 7-9, and Tuesday, 2-4 and 7-9. Funeral Mass Wednesday, 10 AM, Church of St. John and Mary, Chappaqua, NY. Entombment Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
